name: nt-message
description: Generated protobuf.js serialize/deserialize and supporting functions for Noita Together

scripts.prepush: npm run genproto && npm test && npm run build
scripts.genproto: mkdir -p ./src/gen && pbjs --es6 -w es6 -t static-module proto/messages.proto -o ./src/gen/pbjs_pb.js && pbts -o ./src/gen/pbjs_pb.d.ts ./src/gen/pbjs_pb.js && pbjs -t json proto/messages.proto -o ./src/gen/pbjs_pb.json

author: Kris Reeves
